channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Clock In Portal- Staff & Attendance Management
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Clock In Portal- Staff & Attendance Management

item.title: CVE-2023-0761|2023-05-15T12:15:43.882Z -- unknown -- clock%20in%20portal-%20staff%20%26%20attendance%20management
item.description: The Clock In Portal- Staff & Attendance Management WordPress plugin through 2.1 does not have CSRF check when deleting Staff members, which could allow attackers to make logged in admins delete arbitrary Staff via a CSRF attack

item.title: CVE-2023-0763|2023-05-15T12:15:37.541Z -- unknown -- clock%20in%20portal-%20staff%20%26%20attendance%20management
item.description: The Clock In Portal- Staff & Attendance Management WordPress plugin through 2.1 does not have CSRF check when deleting Holidays, which could allow attackers to make logged in admins delete arbitrary holidays via a CSRF attack

item.title: CVE-2023-0762|2023-05-15T12:15:32.523Z -- unknown -- clock%20in%20portal-%20staff%20%26%20attendance%20management
item.description: The Clock In Portal- Staff & Attendance Management WordPress plugin through 2.1 does not have CSRF check when deleting designations, which could allow attackers to make logged in admins delete arbitrary designations via a CSRF attack
